text: @MobilePunch @femigbaja @HouseNGR 400 pieces of Toyota Camry 2020 worth over $25k distributed to the house against ventilators worth $17k to fight covid19. God will punish all of you, Covid19 will catch up with you'll and your entire generation. Amen

domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Brand Category
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

domain.name: Product
domain.description: Products created by Brands.  Examples: Ford Explorer, Apple iPhone.

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.
